user_query: I am planning a trip to Europe and I need to know the historical exchange rate between USD and EUR for the past month. Can you provide me with the OHLC history of the currency pair EUR/USD?

TaskList.description: Query the historical exchange rates for USD to EUR for the past month.
Retrieve the OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) data for the EUR/USD currency pair from the results of step 1.
